PLAY.TITLE: The Life of Henry the Fifth

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: DUKE OF EXETER, uncle to the King.
DUKE OF YORK, cousin to the King.
CHARLES the Sixth, King of France.
Ambassadors to the King of England.
KATHARINE, daughter to Charles and Isabel.
ALICE, a lady attending on her.
Hostess of a tavern in Eastcheap formerly Mistress Quickly, and now married to Pistol.
Lords, Ladies, Officers, Soldiers, Citizens, Messengers, and Attendants. Chorus.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. An ante-chamber in the KING'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF CANTERBURY, and the BISHOP OF ELY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same. The Presence chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING HENRY V, GLOUCESTER, BEDFORD, EXETER, WARWICK, WESTMORELAND, and Attendants
Enter the ARCHBISHOP OF CANTERBURY, and the BISHOP of ELY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Corporal NYM and Lieutenant BARDOLPH

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Southampton. A council-chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Trumpets sound. Enter KING HENRY V, SCROOP,
CAMBRIDGE, GREY, and Attendants

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING HENRY V
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt CAMBRIDGE, SCROOP and GREY, guarded

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. London. Before a tavern.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PISTOL, Hostess, NYM, BARDOLPH, and Boy

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. France. The KING'S palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter the FRENCH KING, the DAUPHIN, the
DUKES of BERRI and BRETAGNE, the Constable, and others
Re-enter Lords, with EXETER and train

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. France. Before Harfleur.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum. Enter KING HENRY, EXETER, BEDFORD,
GLOUCESTER, and Soldiers, with scaling-ladders
Exeunt. Alarum, and chambers go off

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter NYM, BARDOLPH, PISTOL, and Boy

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The same. Before the gates.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
The Governor and some Citizens on the walls; the
English forces below. Enter KING HENRY and his train
Flourish. The King and his train enter the town

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The FRENCH KING's palace.
SCENE V. The same.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the KING OF FRANCE, the DAUPHIN, the DUKE oF
BOURBON, the Constable Of France, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. The English camp in Picardy.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: FLUELLEN
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Drum and colours. Enter KING HENRY, GLOUCESTER, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. The French camp, near Agincourt:
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter the Constable of France, the LORD RAMBURES,
ORLEANS, DAUPHIN, with others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. The English camp at Agincourt.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING HENRY, BEDFORD, and GLOUCESTER

Enter three soldiers, JOHN BATES, ALEXANDER COURT,
and MICHAEL WILLIAMS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. The French camp.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter the DAUPHIN, ORLEANS, RAMBURES, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. The English camp.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter GLOUCESTER, BEDFORD, EXETER, ERPINGHAM, with
all his host: SALISBURY and WESTMORELAND

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. The field of battle.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum. Excursions. Enter PISTOL, French Soldier, and Boy

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter Constable, ORLEANS, BOURBON, DAUPHIN, and RAMBURES

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarums. Enter KING HENRY and forces, EXETER, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum. Enter KING HENRY, and forces; WARWICK,
GLOUCESTER, EXETER, and others
Points to WILLIAMS. Exeunt Heralds with Montjoy

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VIII. Before KING HENRY'S pavilion.
SCENE I. France. The English camp.
SCENE II. France. A royal palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter, at one door KING HENRY, EXETER, BEDFORD,
GLOUCESTER, WARWICK, WESTMORELAND, and other Lords;
at another, the FRENCH KING, QUEEN ISABEL, the
PRINCESS KATHARINE, ALICE and other Ladies; the
DUKE of BURGUNDY, and his train
Exeunt all except HENRY, KATHARINE, and ALICE

Re-enter the FRENCH KING and his QUEEN, BURGUNDY,
and other Lords
